Monday to Friday from 9:00 am to 9:00 pm Paylivre is a company that facilitates electronic payment services that allows you to make deposits and withdrawals on international websites. The performance of PAYLIVRE BRASIL complies with the protocols established by BACEN and by Law 12,865/2013. PAYLIVRE BRASIL does not operate in the Brazilian Capital Market. The content published here does not constitute investment recommendation, investment or bet. PAYLIVRE BRASIL does not raise funds and does not make investments, financial contributions or bets. Camera Choose Gallery Crop Edit Photo Original Crop Rotate Scale Transfer Instructions In compliance with the rules of the Central Bank of Brazil, third party deposits will not be accepted, the CPF/CNPJ of the account registered on the website must be the same as the CPF/CNPJ of the bank account. Please transfer the exact amount of the request within 2 hours (two hours) after issuing this order. If you are going to transfer a different amount, the deposit cannot be carried out without sending proof of payment, and it may take up to 2 business days to be processed. To ensure speedy approval of your deposit, make a TED transfer by 4:30 pm on weekdays. Transfers made after this time will be cleared by 10:00 am on the next business day. If your deposit is not credited within 1 business day, please contact our WhatsApp Service Center +55 21 2010-5124 with your details and proof of deposit. In case of reversal of the deposit due to discrepancies between the data, the transfer amount will be refunded less your bank s transfer fee within 15 working days. Please contact support. The requested withdrawal exceeds the maximum amount. Only one withdrawal can be made per day with a maximum value of R$ 5,000.00. Only one withdrawal can be made per day with a maximum value of US$ 1,000.00. Only one withdrawal can be performed per day. The withdrawal must have a maximum value of %1$s.
